issue.title: [Gandiva][Crossbow] Revert template to have commit ids.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are dependent on the commit ids being present in the cross bow travis templates so that we can sync our builds against the same commit id that was used to create the artifacts.

So reverting back fetch-head to give back arrow-head.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5776?focusedCommentId=16898976) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4738
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4738>
